feed.title: Cisco Earnings Top Estimates, Stock Falls On Weak Revenue Outlook
feed.summary: Cisco Systems ( CSCO ) issued a weaker-than-expected revenue outlook for fiscal 2024 while fiscal fourth-quarter earnings topped estimates. CSCO stock fell on the news. For the period that ended July 29, Cisco earnings rose 37% to 1.14 per share. Revenue climbed 16% to $15.2 billion.
